long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use this extension to manage the pages you have researched and share them with your members.

Please check the URL below for details on how to use it.
https://fito2prg.com/archives/463

Specific usage

1. You need to sign up on the page below that works with this Chrome extension.

https://searchistory.web.app/

2. You register the topic in the app.

3. You click the extension icon to log in.

4. You register the topic you just created.

5. Register the page you want to register by associating it with the topic.
